title: Man, 20, dies after 'medical episode' at Talbot Green playing fields
article: A 20-year-old has died after a "medical episode" in a park. South Wales Police were called to Talbot Green Playing Fields, in Rhondda Cynon Taf, at about 16:30 GMT on Saturday. Emergency services attended but the man died at the scene. His next of kin have been informed and police said there were no suspicious circumstances. Formal identification has yet to take place.
